headline: Greenisland and Valley Rangers clinch NIWFA League titles
summary: It was a double for Greenisland as their sides clinched the NIWFA Division One and Six titles, while Valley Rangers became champions in the Fifth. A revenge victory for their recent Super Cup defeat saw […]

summary: Pre-Season games came with extra competitiveness as Newcastle United won the Sela Cup and Cheltenham Civil Service the Severn Sport Trophy. Saturday 10 August Great Britain Deaf L-W Your Potential Women’s XI Newcastle United 2-2 […]

headline: Barclays Scottish Women’s Championship opens with bragging rights for Bairns
summary: Falkirk kicked off the 2024/25 Barclays Scottish Women’s Championship season with a 4-0 victory in their local derby at Stenhousemuir. It was a high-tempo start to the season for the newly-sponsored third and fourth tier […]

headline: USA Women beat Brazil 1-0 to win Olympic gold
summary: USA edged Brazil with a Mallory Swanson second-half goal to win the Paris 2024 Olympics Gold Medal Match. Ludmila should have had Brazil ahead inside two minutes but shot straight at Alyssa Naeher when through […]

headline: Manchester United Women sign Canada international Simi Awujo
summary: Manchester United have signed Canada international midfielder Simi Awujo on a contract through to the end of the 2026/27 season. The 20-year-old, who has 19 caps for her country, joins from the University of Southern […]

headline: Germany Women win Olympic bronze in tale of two penalties
summary: Germany took the bronze medal at the 2024 Paris Olympics with a 1-0 win over Spain and a last-minute Ann-Katrin Berger penalty save. Spain hit the crossbar twice in the first half, Teresa Abelleira from […]

headline: 2024/25 Adobe Women’s FA Cup early rounds drawn
summary: The first two draws in the Adobe Women’s FA Cup 2024-25 season have been made, with ties commencing next month. There’s 144 ties in the first round qualifying on Sunday 1 September, before the second round qualifying takes place […]

headline: Crystal Palace Women sign Dutch international Ashleigh Weerden
summary: Crystal Palace have signed Netherlands international winger Ashleigh Weerden from Ajax with whom she won two trophies. She played nearly 70 times for the Dutch development age-groups, before her senior debut in 2019. After 60 […]

headline: Manchester City Women sign Japan goalkeeper Ayaka Yamashita
summary: Manchester City have signed Japanese international goalkeeper Ayaka Yamashita on a deal until the summer of 2027. The 28-year-old six-time Japanese top flight winner has 74 caps for her country, played over 100 times for […]

headline: Women’s pre-season friendlies for 10/11 August
